string.name: navigation_drawer_header_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the image that is shown at the top of the navigation drawer.

string.name: memes_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Top Memes' screen where the user can see the list of best memes

resources.string: This API doesn\'t share endpoints for retrieving top voted images but similar GET request is also presented in Make meme section in menu
